Critical hit chance and critical hit power also apply to bombs. Bombs are thrown without any delay.

Alternate Sign Mode:
Deals $I$ points of damage to enemies within a $I$ yard radius. Damage scales with Sign intensity (current damage: $I$). Destroys projectiles passing through this area. Lasts for $I$s. Turret charges - $I$.

Each Adrenaline Point adds $I$% to the chance of killing an opponent instantly. Does not apply to Whirl.

Strong attack that goes through blocks and shields. Deals additional $S$% damage plus $S$% damage per Adrenaline Point in proportion to the Stamina consumed ($S$% max). Increases critical hit chance by $S$%.
Spinning attack that strikes all foes in the surrounding area. Deals $S$% less damage. Maintaining the attack consumes Stamina and Adrenaline. Damage received is decreased by $S$% during the attack.
Spinning attack that strikes all foes in the surrounding area. Deals $S$% less damage. Maintaining the attack consumes Stamina and Adrenaline. Damage received is decreased by $S$% during the attack.
Adrenaline Gain
Strong Attacks increase Fast Attack damage for $S$ seconds by $S$% for each piece of the set. And vice versa. Current bonus: $S$%.
Each piece of the set decreases sign casting stamina cost by $S$%. Current bonus: $S$%.
The size of Yrden traps is increased by $S$%. While you are within an Yrden trap, Sign Intensity is increased by $S$% and damage resistance is increased by $S$%.
Critical hits with a sword double Adrenaline gained.
Knockdown chance

Crossbow critical hit chance is increased by $S$% and critical hit power - by $S$%. Crossbow bolts pierce and knock down or stun opponents. Opponents struck when they have full Vitality lose $S$% of Vitality.
Undying

When Vitality reaches zero, Adrenaline Points will be consumed to prevent death and grant invulnerability and increased Vitality regeneration for $S$s. Restores $S$% of Vitality per Adrenaline Point (max $S$%). Cannot be triggered more than once every $S$s.

When Vitality reaches zero, Adrenaline Points will be consumed to prevent death and grant invulnerability and increased Vitality regeneration for $S$s. Restores $S$% of Vitality per Adrenaline Point (max $S$%). Cannot be triggered more than once every $S$s.

Successful counterattack increases next attack power by $I$%. Each Adrenaline Point increases knockdown chance by $I$% (max $I$%, adrenaline is consumed on success).

Creates an active shield which absorbs $I$% more damage. Maintaining it drains $I$ Stamina Points per second. Blocked attacks drain Stamina proportional to damage absorbed. Restores Vitality by $I$% of damage absorbed.

Creates an active shield which absorbs $I$% more damage. Maintaining it drains $I$ Stamina Points per second. Blocked attacks drain Stamina proportional to damage absorbed. Restores Vitality by $I$% of damage absorbed.

Appropriate oil applied to blades gives a $I$% chance of poisoning the target on each hit. Enhanced oil increases this chance by $I$% and Superior - by $I$%.

Signs can deal critical hits. Their critical hit chance and power increase with Sign Intensity (current critical hit chance -  $S$%, critical hit power - $S$%). Opponents killed by critical hits from Signs explode.

When the Aard Sign is cast, it additionally has a $S$% chance of freezing opponents. Opponents knocked down and frozen simultaneously die immediately. Opponents who are not frozen are dealt an additional $S$ damage. Damage scales with Sign intensity. Current damage: $S$.
Magic trap that slows enemies down by $S$% (scales with Sign Intensity) inside its area of effect. Trap duration: $S$s.

At start of combat, Attack Power and Sign Intensity increase by $S$% for each foe (after first) for $S$s. So, when fighting $S$ foes, the bonus is $S$%. Once it wears off, Attack Power and Sign Intensity drop by $S$% for each participating foe after first (but no more than by $S$%) for $S$s.
